summary: A woman of twenty-one opens her grandfather's will left to her thirteen years earlier, per his instructions. Murder soon follows.
cast: Dick Purcell|Helen Parrish|Tim Ryan|Frank Faylen|Johnny Duncan|John Dawson|Addison Richards|Jacqueline Dalya|Cyril Ring|Paul McVey|Lloyd Ingraham|Robert J. Anderson|Shirley Jean Anderson|Mike Donovan|Lester Dorr|Dick Gordon|Herbert Heyes|Donald Kerr|Wilbur Mack|Dick Rush|Fred 'Snowflake' Toones
title: The Mystery of the 13th Guest
